text:
Example:
```x = [rand(10) for i in 1:20]
[median(getindex.(x, i)) for i in 1:10]```

text: As soon as you do dynamical systems you run into this all the time. Just an example: If your iterable produces vectors and you collect them you have a vector of vectors.
